categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Skirmish aboard a Rebel ship of the line

In 3 ABY, during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, there was a skirmish aboard a Rebel ship of the line when Admiral Damon Krell sent an Infiltrator probe droid to trap and attack Luke Skywalker.
